description: Four-speaker planning call: sprint retrospective (Monday 10 AM), design review (Tuesday 3 PM), quarterly all-hands reminder (Wednesday 1 PM), and budget proposal sync (Thursday 9:30 AM).

events.title: Sprint Retrospective
events.reasoning: Alice asks Dave to set up the sprint retrospective for Monday at 10 AM. Dave confirms and will book the large conference room. Carol requests it be kept to 1 hour.

events.title: Design Review
events.reasoning: Bob proposes he and Carol sit down to review mockups on Tuesday at 3 PM. Carol confirms and suggests the design lab.
events.assumptions: Assumed 1-hour duration as no end time was specified

events.title: Quarterly All-Hands
events.reasoning: Alice reminds the team that the quarterly all-hands is on Wednesday at 1 PM. It is company-wide. Dave notes he will skip due to a dentist appointment.

events.title: Budget Proposal Sync
events.reasoning: Alice asks Bob to sync on the budget proposal Thursday morning. Bob suggests 9:30. Alice confirms Thursday at 9:30 in her office.
events.assumptions: Assumed 1-hour duration as no end time was specified

mock_llm_response.summary: Found 4 events: sprint retrospective Monday 10 AM, design review Tuesday 3 PM, quarterly all-hands Wednesday 1 PM, and budget sync Thursday 9:30 AM.

notes: Reference datetime is Friday 2026-02-20. 'Monday' = Feb 23, 'Tuesday' = Feb 24, 'Wednesday' = Feb 25, 'Thursday' = Feb 26. The quarterly all-hands is a reminder but still creates an event. Dave skips the all-hands but that does not affect event creation.
